plot: Angry and frustrated Cameron Clothier unleashes his rage on those who hurt him, all the while surreptitiously courting an angelic barista in his neighborhood coffee shop and - almost against his will - finding redemption in love.
title: The Art of Getting Over It
plot_es: Angry and frustrated Cameron Clothier unleashes his rage on those who hurt him, all the while surreptitiously courting an angelic barista in his neighborhood coffee shop and - almost against his will - finding redemption in love.
original_name: The Art of Getting Over It
plot_en: Angry and frustrated Cameron Clothier unleashes his rage on those who hurt him, all the while surreptitiously courting an angelic barista in his neighborhood coffee shop and - almost against his will - finding redemption in love.
